Description: Communications Plan Structure Development - Define roles/responsibilities/escalation paths (REQ-COMM-001)
Notes: Construction Manager as responsible party; includes role definitions and plan governance authority

Description: Meeting Cadence and Structure Definition - 4 meeting types with agendas/attendees (REQ-COMM-002)
Progress Reporting Requirements - Monthly report structure and distribution (REQ-COMM-003)
Notes: Report template structure and content requirements

Description: Change Management Communication Protocol - Change order process and approval workflow (REQ-COMM-004)
RFI Protocol and Escalation Process - 3 priority levels with timelines (REQ-COMM-005)
Safety and Emergency Communication Protocol - Incident notification requirements (REQ-COMM-006)
Commissioning and Training Communication - Coordination with Fire/Public Works operations (REQ-COMM-007)
Notes: Weekly commissioning coordination; training scheduling protocols

Description: Subconsultant and Subtrade Coordination - Single-point-of-responsibility structure (REQ-COMM-008)
Document Control and Distribution Protocols - Naming conventions/version control (REQ-COMM-009)
Decision Tracking and Action Item Management - Registers and escalation (REQ-COMM-010)
Cyclic Plan Compliance Review Mechanism (REQ-COMM-011)
Notes: Quarterly review cadence and adjustment mechanisms

Description: Operational Validation During Execution (REQ-COMM-012)
Stakeholder Register Development - 8 stakeholder groups with communication needs
Communications Performance Metrics (KPIs) - 6 KPIs with targets
Communications Infrastructure Readiness Planning - 7 components
Visual Artifacts Creation - Meeting diagram/cadence timeline/escalation flowchart
Cross-Deliverable Consistency Verification - DEL-04-01/04-02/03-01/06-01 alignment
Proposal Manager Review - Draft review and alignment with evaluation criteria
Independent Review and Sign-Off - Per Procedure Step 12
Submission Readiness Checklist Completion - Final verification
Contingency - 15% of base estimate for uncertainty
Notes: PCT_BY_BUCKET method at 15% on CAD 8620 base
